txt.en: 'Send up anything except a green firework; this will be unexpected!'
'How about something besides green? Launch it now!'
'This is not the time for resting, launch your green fireworks!'
'How about a bright green one? Launch it now!'
'Send up a green firework, this is the perfect time for one!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that is green!'
'Send up a blue firework, this is the perfect time for one!'
'How about a bright blue one? Launch it now!'
'This is not the time for resting, launch your blue fireworks!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that is blue!'
'Send up a yellow firework, this is the perfect time for one!'
'How about a bright yellow one? Launch it now!'
'This is not the time for yellow fireworks, but any other colour will do!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that isn't yellow!'
'Quickly, launch a red firework high into the sky!'
'Welcome, everyone, to the fireworks show! Tonight's event will begin shortly.'
'Please speak with me if you would like to participate in tonight's show!'
'Thank you everyone for coming. Please return at nightfall for our next show!'
'Let the show begin!'
'I will be saving some fireworks to use for other occasions. You never know when you might need them!'
'No one does fireworks better than at the Methel-stage in Bywater! Well, except for Gandalf, I suppose...'
'Thank you for coming to celebrate with us today!'
'This is not the time for green fireworks, but any other colour will do!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that isn't green!'
'Quickly, launch a firework that's not blue high into the sky!'
'Send up anything except a blue firework; this will be unexpected!'
'How about something besides blue? Launch it now!'
'This is not the time for blue fireworks, but any other colour will do!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that isn't blue!'
'Quickly, launch a firework that's not yellow high into the sky!'
'Send up anything except a yellow firework; this will be unexpected!'
'How about something besides yellow? Launch it now!'
'Marvelous!'
'A simply splendid show!'
'Gandalf the Grey would be proud!'
'Quickly, launch a red firework high into the sky!'
'Give it your best, [placeholder]!'
'Quickly, launch a green firework high into the sky!'
'Fantastic! What a surprise!'
'Quickly, launch a blue firework high into the sky!'
'Brilliant!'
'Quickly, launch a yellow firework high into the sky!'
'The combination of colours is wonderful.'
Fireworks Announcer
'Well done, [placeholder].'
'Send up a red firework, this is the perfect time for one!'
'This show was certainly worth the journey here.'
'How about a bright red one? Launch it now!'
'Astounding! Light up the night sky!'
'This is not the time for resting, launch your red fireworks!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that is red!'
'I know for a fact that they have firework shows, day and night, in Bywater. Honest!'
'Do you suppose that Gandalf might lend us some fireworks for a show of our own?
'I refuse to wait until sundown for fireworks. I bet there's a show at the Methel-stage right now!'
'We should eat soon. I can't enjoy a show on an empty stomach!'
'Fireworks always make me so hungry.'
'Try not to use fireworks indoors, it's just not very safe.'
'All these fine folk must have come here to see us today! What do you think of that?'
'Which way to the Prancing Pony? I need a drink...'
'So which style of fireworks show do you prefer, precision or chaos?'
'We really need to spread the word. We want a big audience for the show tonight.'
'I will certainly drink to that!'
'What an enjoyable performance.'
'Show them how it is done, [placeholder]!'
'A finer show I have never seen!'
'Show us how it is done, [placeholder].'
'This seems like a perfect way to end a celebration!'
'Oooooh! Aaaaaah!'
'This brings back memories of watching fireworks as a child...'
'Ooooh! Aaaaah!'
'Fantastic!'
'Show us your best, [placeholder]!'
'Well, that choice of colour was rather unexpected...'
'How exciting! A performance to be remembered.'
'Whenever this ends, it will be too soon.'
'So many surprising colours, and patterns!'
'Oh! That caught me off guard! What's coming next?'
'Send it up high and fast, [placeholder]!'
'Don't stop now, [placeholder]!'
'More! More! It is simply not enough yet!'
'Good show, [placeholder]!'
'Master Smith, I require my sickle to be mended.'
'Very well, you may leave it there and pick it up one week hence.'
'That will not do! I have a field to tend, and I need this sickle sharp and in working order today.'
'I have no time, master hobbit. If you need it so quickly, why don't you take it to one of the other smiths?'
'Because all the other smiths are liars and cheats and do not treat us hobbits with any respect!'
'Perhaps that is why I am so busy. Very well, leave it here, and I will see if I can tend to it tomorrow. Will that satisfy you?'
'I suppose it shall have to!'
'I suppose it shall.'
'Fantastic!'
'Hooray!'
'More! Give us more!'
'Cheers!'
'Please be patient, the show will begin in just a few minutes.'
'Feel free to join us. Fireworks are better with friends!'
'[placeholder] has quite the timing!'
'This takes me back to my youthful years.'
'This is not the time for resting, launch your yellow fireworks!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that is yellow!'
'Quickly, launch a firework that's not red high into the sky!'
'Send up anything except a red firework; this will be unexpected!'
'How about something besides red? Launch it now!'
'This is not the time for red fireworks, but any other colour will do!'
'Let's dazzle the crowd with a firework that isn't red!'
'Quickly, launch a firework that's not green high into the sky!'
